actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that the United States should take certain actions to assist Israel in the event that the United States provides AWACS to Saudi Arabia.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that, if the United States decides to sell AWACS to Saudi Arabia, the United States shall help Israel procure and finance any additional radar and communications jamming equipment needed to protect Israel against any new threat posed by Saudi AWACS.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that the United States should take certain actions to assist Israel in the event that the United States provides AWACS to Saudi Arabia.
